General.Name: Hubei Energy Group Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Hubei Energy Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in investment, development, and management of energy business in China. The company generates electric energy using hydro, thermal, and nuclear power; and operates new energy power generation business. It also transmit and distributes natural gas; and engages in provision of coal trading and financial investment services. Hubei Energy Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Wuhan, the People's Republic of China.

0.Name: Mr. Juntao  Wang
0.Title: Board Sec., Chief Accountant & Gen. Counsel
